textContent:
---xoxo---

Hi Rei! I'm writing while you are sleeping (which are usually the times when I write my letters) and waiting for my turn at the barber shop (andami nakapila bby HAHAHAHA). 

Yesterday's intermission was really memorable. You got to meet my family. Thank you so much for meeting them!!! I feel really proud and happy that I finally get to introduce them to you!!! After all, you're the girl I plan to spend the rest of my life with!! Kabilang sila sa mga magsasawa kase lagi na tayo magkasama niyan HAHAHAHA.

Additionally (and more importantly), J.  Christ. I kissed you a lot yesterday!! And hugs too!! But I like the kisses more! I'll never get tired of that feeling too, Rei. I actually miss them already. 

I miss the feeling of how soft your lips where and how bouncy your cheeks where.

Of how I'd stare into your eyes and then proceed to kiss you.

Of how I'd softly whisper I love you and then you'd whisper it back too 

I miss the feeling of your head in my chest as we watch(?) the movie and how I'll kiss your head because the moment just feels unreal and too good.

I love you so much Rei. I crave for more moments like these in our future together.
